column1: The Masters in Computational Geoscience explores how we model the natural world and the environment around us (and the processes that create them).You will develop applied data science and modelling skills which you can use to address complex real-world challenges and support decision-making in geoscience fields. You will develop skills that are in high-demand in the geoscience sector, including computer programming, predictive modelling and big data analysis.
